name: Dinari LMT
description: Dinari LMT dShares (LMT.d) represent 1:1 ownership of shares in Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT), a global leader in aerospace, defense, and security. As one of the largest defense contractors in the world, Lockheed Martin designs and manufactures advanced technologies, including fighter jets, space systems, and defense solutions. Each LMT.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Lockheed Martin share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, Dinari dShares offer investors fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, making investments in the defense sector more accessible.
